description:
In a light and durable package, these 3-section poles help keep your balance on day hikes, highline scrambles and coastal hikes. And on the downhill, they're a great trick for saving your knees from unnecessary strain.

  • 3-section design gives you 100-140cm of usable length for any terrain
  • Aluminum construction is light, durable and economical
  • Double FlickLocks can be used with gloves and securely close the pole
  • Dual-density EVA grips for a light and comfortable hold
  • Recycled nylon webbing adjusts to your wrist and has a lining for comfort
  • Carbide tip gives good traction on variable ground
  • Low profile trekking baskets reduce snag
name: Black Diamond Trailback Trekking Poles - Unisex
